name: Die4Me
description:
Die4Me it is a game about teams and the sacrifice needed to reach goals. Control a team of creatures with different skills to reach the end of each level. But be aware that sacrifice is essential for success! Creatures will turn into totems, reverse gravity, transform into wind, and find weird ways to immolate themselves for the greater good!

Die4Me is a puzzle-platform game developed as a student project within the Video game Design and Programming course at the Politecnico di Milano. More information at:

http://www.polimigamecollective.org

http://youtu.be/LbPV6_7CwLw
